attributes.action: Ensure the Courts uphold Leeds Uniteds points penalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They bent the rules, broke the rules, were lucky to get their "share" for League status and failed to pay back Millions in debts ! but not content Fat Ken went back on his word again ..
relegate them two divisions !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
